puzzles.title: The Enchanted Riddle Scroll
puzzles.question: I have cities, but no houses. I have rivers, but no water. I have forests, but no trees. What am I?
puzzles.hint: Think of something flat and old that a scholar might keep rolled in a scroll tube.

puzzles.title: The Sword of Lineage
puzzles.question:
Which ancient element was once believed to be the fifth, beyond earth, water, fire, and air?

A) Ether
B) Stone
C) Light
D) Void
puzzles.hint: The word starts with an “E” and is often associated with the heavens.

puzzles.title: Royal Lock Cipher
puzzles.question: Decode this cipher: ‘uifsf jt op qfbdf xjuipvu b xbse’
puzzles.answer: there is no peace without a ward
puzzles.hint: Try Caesar cipher — shift each letter back by 1.

puzzles.title: The Silent Guardian
puzzles.question: What has hands but can’t clap?
